alert.note: Alert for New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued January 13 at 11:03AM EST until January 13 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...In Delaware, New Castle. In New Jersey, Salem. * WHEN...Until 3 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At this level, flooding begins on the most vulnerable roads along tidal waterways. Some partial or full road closures are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Widespread minor to locally moderate coastal flooding impacts are expected with the current high tide cycle. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Delaware River at Reedy Point MLLW Categories - Minor 7.2 ft, Moderate 8.2 ft, Major 9.2 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 2.4 ft, Major 3.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 13/12 PM 7.6 1.8 1.7 Minor 14/01 AM 5.3 -0.5 0.4 None 14/01 PM 6.3 0.5 0.5 None 15/02 AM 4.9 -0.9 0.0 None 15/02 PM 6.0 0.2 0.4 None 16/03 AM 6.0 0.2 1.0 None &&
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
